Make life better with BOBOBIRD

How do we do it?

Comes with free fix tool the wrist band is adjustable.The clasp type is folding clasp with safety;
BOBO BIRD Watch is Packed with Original Unique Bamboo Wooden Gift Box, Which is the Great and Decent Present for Friends, Lovers,Relatives and Best Gift for Xmas,Graduation,Wedding and Anniversary.
100% Guaranty & High Quality Service — Lifetime Before and after-sale service & BOBO BIRD Manufacture Warranty. BOBO BIRD is always there and be with you.

BOBO BIRD is a manufacturer who design and produce watches, we hold our watches to the highest standards of craftsmanship, authenticity, and quality. Each one of our products is truly an original. Every watch are handcrafted with Ancient Asian sustainable wood. Various types of materials including teak, ebony, maple and even bamboo, are all used during the creation process. These trees are hand selected by our expert craftsmen to ensure the exceptional quality of our wooden wrist watches.

Read more

Item Specifics:

  • Band Width: 23.1mm(0.9in)
  • Band Length: 22cm(8.67in)
  • Case Thickness: 15mm(0.59in)
  • Dial Diameter: 47.9mm(1.88in)
  • Weight: 82g
  • Water Resistance Depth: No waterproof
  • Dial Window Material Type: Hardlex
  • Clasp Type: Bracelet Clasp

Read more

Natural African Blackwood and Verawood

Made of Natural African Blackwood and Verawood. All wood is hand sanded and polished to a smooth, durable finish. Only 82g, Lightweight and Comfortable.Our hand-selected, premium hardwoods do not deteriorate or become brittle due to every day wear. Size can be adjusted by adding or removing links with tool, or by local jeweler.

Time is of the Essence

BOBO BIRD Watch Helps to Cherish Your Time,Treasure Your Every Moment.

No Battery Needed

Self-winding Sea-Gull movement powers vibrant silver hands for ultra-accurate, battery free time keeping.

Great Gift

BOBO BIRD Watch is Packed with Original Unique Bamboo Gift Box, Which is the Great and Decent Present for Friends, Lovers, Relatives and Best Gift for Graduation,Wedding and Anniversary etc.

BOBO BIRD Mens Automatic Mechanical Wooden Watches Top Band Luxury Lightweight Timepieces for Men

Automatic Enthusiasts Collection

For automatic enthusiasts, a dual wheel is a must have for their collection. Automatic watches are extremely accurate as they barely lose 3 seconds per day. so you don’t have to miss another meeting or appointment.

Natural & Unique Textures

Natural wood offers accentuated grain patterns that change tone in different light. each watch possess a unique appearance.

Exquisite Side Face

BOBO BIRD Brand design Top Luxury Timepieces

BOBO BIRD is a manufacturer who design and produce watches, we hold our watches to the highest standards of craftsmanship, authenticity, and quality.

Each one of our products is truly an original. Every watch are handcrafted with Ancient Asian sustainable wood.

Various types of materials including teak, ebony, maple and even bamboo, are all used during the creation process.

These trees are hand selected by our expert craftsmen to ensure the exceptional quality of our wooden wrist watches.

Automatic Enthusiasts Collection

For automatic enthusiasts, a dual wheel is a must have for their collection. Automatic watches are extremely accurate as they barely lose 3 seconds per day. so you don’t have to miss another meeting or appointment.

No Battery Needed

Self-winding Sea-Gull movement powers vibrant silver hands for ultra-accurate, battery free time keeping.

Natural Red Sandalwood and Ebony

Made of Natural Red Sandalwood and Ebony. All wood is hand sanded and polished to a smooth, durable finish. Only 82g, Lightweight and Comfortable

Read more

Unique Design

These watches are unique, not simply calling for attention.Our wood watches for men are the trendy investment pieces you’ve long been waiting for.

Natural Wooden Band

Our hand-selected, premium hardwoods do not deteriorate or become brittle due to every day wear. Size can be adjusted by adding or removing links with tool, or by local jeweler

Bracelet Clasp

Dual locking deployment buckle and reinforced clasp secure adjustable wood bracelet (removable metal pins secure links together).

Perfect Gift

It is an ideal gift for birthday, anniversary, Christmas, Father’s Day and Valentine’s Day.
